title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.J.Res. 76 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
August 04, 2014

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.J.Res. 76




On Monday, August 4, 2014, the President signed into law:
H.J.Res. 76, which provides fiscal year (FY) 2014 emergency supplemental appropriations for the Government of Israel's Iron Dome defense system to counter short-range rocket threats.Â
